mapper.select: select t.title as productTitle, t.cover_url as productCover, t.store_id as storeId, r.line_id as productId from line_order r inner join `order` t on t.order_no = r.order_no where t.id = #{orderId} and r.order_no = #{orderNo} and t.deleted = false

select t.order_no, r.cover_url, r.title, r.verify_no, t.duration, r.pay_type, r.refund_type, r.refund_state, r.price, r.discount_amount, r.num, r.state, r.pay_amount, r.create_time, r.pay_time, r.mobile, r.nick_name, r.complete_time, t.visit_date, t.duration, r.remark from `order` r inner join line_order t on t.order_no = r.order_no where t.deleted = false and r.member_id = #{memberId} and r.order_no = #{orderNo}

select t.order_no, r.cover_url, r.title, r.verify_no, t.duration, r.pay_type, r.refund_type, r.refund_state, r.price, t.start_province_id, t.start_city_id, r.discount_amount, r.num, r.state, r.pay_amount, r.create_time, r.pay_time, r.mobile, r.nick_name, r.complete_time, t.visit_date, t.duration, r.remark from `order` r inner join line_order t on t.order_no = r.order_no where t.deleted = false and r.order_no = #{orderNo}
and r.merchant_id = #{merchantId}

select r.cover_url, r.title, t.travel_agency_id, r.logo_url as travelLogoUrl, r.title as travelName, t.start_province_id, t.start_city_id, t.duration, t.line_price, t.sale_price, t.introduce from line_order t left join travel_agency r on r.id = t.travel_agency_id where t.deleted = false and t.order_no = #{orderNo}
and t.member_id = #{merchantId}
